title: Simple ATS
summary: Zoho Recruit has everything you need for recruiting and running a staffing company. Everything is streamlined and easy to understand. Easy to train staff to use. Makes life so much easier than using spreadsheets. That is where we have come from using, those good ol' spreadsheets. Saves me time and money as many other software systems costs hundreds of dollars.
weakness: More intergration with candidates profile and indeed.

title: JISCHOOLERP, FINALLY A PLATFORM TO AUTOMATE THE HARD WORK IN SCHOOL MANAGEMENT
summary: As many a school manager at all levels will agree, the essentials of maintaining the perfect balance in School-Students-Parents relationship, as in keeping everyone on the same page when disseminating vital information or communicating emergent policy changes, can be a severe pain point. There are times when a slight amendment in policy regarding the yearly award of prizes to deserving students can cause great furor among a section of the parent's association. But thankfully this, as I hear, is where JiSchoolERP excels best. Which is why I'm rushing in enquiries for more information about it.
strength: Being able to provide a viable platform for parent's to sync with the school's emerging and upcoming policy shifts
weakness: If it takes the pain point stated above off a school manager, there should be no complaints

title: Very convenient service!
summary: Priceva has truly demonstrated its worth in the market with its advanced features, top-notch service, and customer-centric approach. This is not just a service for us, but a strategic partner in our business operations. We've seen tangible benefits from using Priceva, and it has certainly earned our strong recommendation.
strength: I have been with this program for a year. Impressions are only positive! Convenient interface, everything is accessible and understandable. As for the analysis itself, here is only up-to-date information. You can choose the most convenient tariff for your company. Support always promptly answers all your questions, a big plus!
weakness: It happens that the monitoring of some stores is incorrect. During the entire period of cooperation there were a couple of times. The error was corrected promptly.

title: Saviom Software Pty. Ltd.
summary:
Saviom is a pioneer and global provider of Enterprise Resource Management and Workforce planning solutions. It has helped many Fortune 500 companies, like Siemens, Telstra, Fujitsu, GWS, and more to optimize their workforce and improve overall business efficiency. The software‚Äôs highly flexible architecture can be configured to meet your unique business requirements.

Saviom‚Äôs intuitive user interface is thoughtfully designed to help users find what they need without a hassle. The open API seamlessly integrates with critical business applications to build a state-of-the-art data exchange framework, eliminating silos and creating a single source of truth.

title: Convenient and fast application
